algorithms

Class BellmanFord<V,E extends WeightedEdge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.BellmanFord<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - type of the vertices of the graph
    E - type of the edges of the graph. Have to extend WeightedEdge

    public class BellmanFord<V,E extends WeightedEdge<V>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Bellman-Ford algorithm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BellmanFord(DirectedGraph<V,E> graph, V source)
      Execute the Bellman-Ford algorithm starting from the source vertex.
